languages.text: "Есть логика в том, чтобы станцией руководил самый способный. Администратум поставил бы на это место какого-нибудь убогого чинушу".

traits.locale_text: "Есть логика в том, чтобы станцией руководил самый способный. Администратум поставил бы на это место какого-нибудь убогого чинушу".

languages.text: "There is a sound logic to having the sharpest mind run the station. The Administratum would've installed some pitiful clerk instead."
languages.original_text: "Есть логика в том, чтобы станцией руководил самый способный. Администратум поставил бы на это место какого-нибудь убогого чинушу".

traits.locale_text: "There is a sound logic to the sharpest mind running the station. The Administratum would've installed some pitiful clerk instead."
"There is a sound logic to the sharpest mind running the station. The Administratum would've installed some pitiful clerk instead."
"There is a sound logic to having the sharpest mind run the station. The Administratum would've installed some pitiful clerk instead."
"There is a sound logic to having the sharpest mind run the station. The Administratum would've installed some pitiful clerk instead."
"There is a sound logic to having the sharpest mind run the station. The Administratum would've installed some pitiful clerk instead."

languages.text: 「確かに、一番賢い頭脳の持ち主にステーションの運営任せるのは、論理的だ。行政局だったら、代わりに哀れな事務員を任命していた可能性がある」
languages.original_text: "There is a sound logic to having the sharpest mind run the station. The Administratum would've installed some pitiful clerk instead."

traits.locale_text: 「確かに、一番賢い頭脳の持ち主にステーションの運営任せるのは、論理的だ。行政局だったら、代わりに哀れな事務員を任命していた可能性がある」

languages.text: “让头脑最敏锐的人来管理星站，是不无道理的。若是让内政部说了算，恐怕他们只会派来一群没用的文员。”
languages.original_text: "There is a sound logic to having the sharpest mind run the station. The Administratum would've installed some pitiful clerk instead."

traits.locale_text: “让头脑最敏锐的人来管理星站，是不无道理的。若是让内政部说了算，恐怕他们只会派来一群没用的文员。”

languages.text: «Que sea la mente más avispada quien gobierne la estación tiene su razón de ser. Si no, el Administratum habría puesto a cualquier mandado».
languages.original_text: "There is a sound logic to having the sharpest mind run the station. The Administratum would've installed some pitiful clerk instead."

traits.locale_text: «Que sea la mente más avispada quien gobierne la estación tiene su razón de ser. Si no, el Administratum habría puesto a cualquier mandado».

languages.text: « Il me semble tout à fait logique de confier les rênes de la station à son esprit le plus brillant. Si vous aviez laissé faire l'Administratum, il aurait nommé l'un de ses gratte-papier incompétents. »
languages.original_text: "There is a sound logic to having the sharpest mind run the station. The Administratum would've installed some pitiful clerk instead."

traits.locale_text: « Il me semble tout à fait logique de confier les rênes de la station à son esprit le plus brillant. Si vous aviez laissé faire l'Administratum, il aurait nommé l'un de ses gratte-papier incompétents. »

languages.text: "Es ist logisch, den klügsten Kopf die Station leiten zu lassen. Das Administratum hätte stattdessen irgendeinen jämmerlichen Beamten installiert."
languages.original_text: "There is a sound logic to having the sharpest mind run the station. The Administratum would've installed some pitiful clerk instead."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist logisch, den klügsten Kopf die Station leiten zu lassen. Das Administratum hätte stattdessen irgendeinen jämmerlichen Beamten installiert."

languages.text: "İstasyonu en kıvrak zekâlı olanın yönetmesi gayet mantıklı. Administratum olsa beceriksiz kâtibin tekini görevlendirirdi."
languages.original_text: "There is a sound logic to having the sharpest mind run the station. The Administratum would've installed some pitiful clerk instead."

traits.locale_text: "İstasyonu en izanlı kişinin yönetmesi gayet mantıklı. Administratum olsa acınası bir kâtip görevlendirirdi."
